about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling freerunning journey with Supermoves, the ultimate parkour party game that is playable with up to 40 players at once in pulse-pounding multiplayer. Featuring eight exciting game modes, Supermoves guarantees an unforgettable multiplayer experience. In addition, the game features a full single player Career Mode with epic races, tournaments and nostalgic goal levels.

🏃🏆 First & Third Person Immersive Parkour


Soar through skylines with both first & third person immersive parkour mechanics. Grind on your feet across rails, trapeze on high wires, wallrun, scramble, and pull off epic backflips and frontflips on trampolines. Supermoves combines arcade elements with thrilling immersive parkour freerunning, both in single- and multiplayer in multiple game modes.

🏃‍♂️🏃‍♀️ Massive Multiplayer Online Running


Face against your friends online in heart-stopping competitions, including braving the ever-rising ball pit in Rising Tide, the brutal Sprint and Circuit, or pulse-pounding Bomb Tag. Mix and match your experience in over 8 game modes, including the fan-favorite Obstacle Course and the nostalgic Loot mode. Chain them together into a playlist-based Royale or Tournament, eliminating the opposition to declare yourself the true winner!

👟🥇 Become the Ultimate Parkour Master


Supermoves features a full single-player Career Mode with classic goal maps, races and tournaments. Rise as a contender in the Supermoves Parkour Championships. Complete objectives in places like the School Gym, Rooftops, Plywood Park, Flatlands, and beyond. Can you climb the ranks and become the ultimate freerunner? The Career Mode in Supermoves is a nostalgic thrill ride back to a more radical era.

🏗️🛠️ Make Your Own Levels, Games & More


Powered by the Makea Editor, every level is crafted using easy-to-place blocks, allowing you to assemble your ultimate parkour races, game shows, obstacle courses, or chill-out spots. Remix any level you find and play them online or offline – the editor can be booted up at any time, and you can use it with your friends online, simultaneously. Share your best levels and make it all your own – the sky’s the limit!
detailed_description:
Feature List



Supermoves Freerun lets you play multiplayer Featured Playlists, which includes six random levels of Supermoves. You can join to your friends lobbies as well. Supermoves Freerun also includes a demo of our Career Mode and a cosmetic track of 100 cosmetics - buy Supermoves at anytime to receive a 2x XP boost to the track!

Buy Supermoves to:

  • Use the Makea Editor to make and remix custom levels
  • Play any levels in the Explore menu and contribute to leaderboards
  • Beat the epic singleplayer Career Mode to get awesome cosmetics and New Game+ cosmetics
  • Get 2x XP in the 100 cosmetic track of rewards
  • Unlock Steam achievements, trading cards & more
  • Support our team!


About the Demo

Embark on a thrilling freerunning journey with Supermoves, the ultimate parkour party game that is playable with up to 40 players at once in pulse-pounding multiplayer. Featuring eight exciting game modes, Supermoves guarantees an unforgettable multiplayer experience. In addition, the game features a full single player Career Mode with epic races, tournaments and nostalgic goal levels.

Soar through skylines with both first & third person immersive parkour mechanics. Grind on your feet across rails, trapeze on high wires, wallrun, scramble, and pull off epic backflips and frontflips on trampolines. Supermoves combines arcade elements with thrilling immersive parkour freerunning, both in single- and multiplayer in multiple game modes.

🏃‍♂️🏃‍♀️ Massive Multiplayer Online Running


Face against your friends online in heart-stopping competitions, including braving the ever-rising ball pit in Rising Tide, the brutal Sprint and Circuit, or pulse-pounding Bomb Tag. Mix and match your experience in over 8 game modes, including the fan-favorite Obstacle Course and the nostalgic Loot mode. Chain them together into a playlist-based Royale or Tournament, eliminating the opposition to declare yourself the true winner!

👟🥇 Become the Ultimate Parkour Master


Supermoves features a full single-player Career Mode with classic goal maps, races and tournaments. Rise as a contender in the Supermoves Parkour Championships. Complete objectives in places like the School Gym, Rooftops, Plywood Park, Flatlands, and beyond. Can you climb the ranks and become the ultimate freerunner? The Career Mode in Supermoves is a nostalgic thrill ride back to a more radical era.

🏗️🛠️ Make Your Own Levels, Games & More


Powered by the Makea Editor, every level is crafted using easy-to-place blocks, allowing you to assemble your ultimate parkour races, game shows, obstacle courses, or chill-out spots. Remix any level you find and play them online or offline – the editor can be booted up at any time, and you can use it with your friends online, simultaneously. Share your best levels and make it all your own – the sky’s the limit!

name: Supermoves Freerun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX2060™ or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires an SSD.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / AMD Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX2070™ Super or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires an SSD.

short_description: Play Supermoves multiplayer for free in Supermoves Freerun! Supermoves is the ultimate parkour showdown where you and your friends run, jump and grind rails to glory! Go head to head in Bomb Tag, reach the finish line before the Rising Tide or race against your friends in Royale. Never stop running.
supported_languages:
English*, Finnish, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
